programme.title: For All Mankind, (1989, Documentary)
programme.desc: A unique view of the moon is made possible through film taken by the Apollo astronauts who landed on the surface.

programme.title: The Flash, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Worlds collide when the Flash travels back in time to change the events of the past. However, when his attempt to save his family alters the future, he becomes trapped in a reality in which General Zod has returned, threatening annihilation.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace, (2013, Thriller)
programme.desc: A steelworker (Christian Bale) takes matters into his own hands when his brother (Casey Affleck) joins one of the Northeast's most-ruthless crime syndicates, then disappears.

programme.title: Oracle, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman accepts a job on a property with a traumatic past. Upon her arrival, she soon realizes that the nightmares of her childhood are connected to the evil in the house.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell, (2009, Horror)
programme.desc: After actions trigger the loss of an old woman's home, an ambitious loan officer finds herself the victim of a powerful curse that will damn her soul for eternity.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop the immortal mutant Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) from destroying mankind.

programme.title: Tiny Furniture, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a recent college graduate (Lena Dunham) moves back in with family while she tries to figure out the next step in life.

programme.title: What's Your Number?, (2011, Romance)
programme.desc: A pessimistic magazine article prompts an unmarried woman to revisit her numerous ex-boyfriends to find out if one of them could be her true love.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: Fantastic Planet, (1973, Animated)
programme.desc: The 39-foot-tall pastel Draags keep leashes on the Oms, their tiny pets descended from humans.

programme.title: The Return of Godzilla, (1984, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Okumura witnesses a huge monster during a storm. Biologist Hayashida hears Okumura's story from Toto Nippo reporter Maki and concludes that Godzilla, who was buried 30 years ago, has come back to life. Godzilla then appears in Tokyo Bay.

programme.title: The Bling Ring, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: A teenager (Israel Broussard) and his gang of fame-obsessed youths (Katie Chang, Taissa Farmiga) use the Internet to track the whereabouts of celebrities, then rob their homes.

programme.title: Son of Godzilla, (1967, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A scientist's (Tadao Takashima) experiments heat up an island as well as Godzilla's egg, hatching a son, Minya.

programme.title: Rodan, (1957, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A bug-eating pterodactyl flies out of a coal mine and wrecks Japan with sonic booms.

programme.title: Mississippi Masala, (1991, Comedy)
programme.desc: People resent the romance of a black man (Denzel Washington) and an Indian woman (Sarita Choudhury) in a Mississippi town.

programme.title: Beowulf, (2007, Animated)
programme.desc: After destroying the demon Grendel, a mighty warrior (Ray Winstone) faces an even-more-potent enemy in the form of its seductive, vengeful mother (Angelina Jolie).

programme.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow, (2020, Animated)
programme.desc: Young Clark Kent works as an intern at the Daily Planet while learning how to save the city of Metropolis.

programme.title: Time Bandits, (1981, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Cosmic dwarfs take a boy on an odyssey featuring Robin Hood (John Cleese), Napoleon, King Agamemnon (Sean Connery).

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Using recovered extraterrestrial technology, the nations of Earth collaborate on an immense defense program to protect the planet. When the aliens attack with unprecedented force, only the ingenuity of a few brave men and women can save the world.

programme.title: Working Girls, (1986, Drama)
programme.desc: A photographer (Louise Smith) and others work for a yuppie madam (Ellen McElduff) in a Manhattan brothel, then go home.

programme.title: A Cure for Wellness, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: After traveling to a remote location in the Swiss Alps, a Wall Street stockbroker (Dane DeHaan) unravels the terrifying secrets of a mysterious spa where guests never leave.

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: After escaping from a cult, a young woman (Elizabeth Olsen) is haunted by her experiences there and fears that its vicious leader (John Hawkes) may be trying to find her.

programme.title: Hercules, (2014, Adventure)
programme.desc: Now a traveling mercenary, Hercules must once again become a hero to help the benevolent king of Thrace protect his people from a powerful warlord.

programme.title: Lord of the Flies, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: English schoolboys (James Aubrey, Tom Chapin, Hugh Edwards), stranded on a desert island without adults, soon turn savage.

programme.title: Lord of the Flies, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: English schoolboys (James Aubrey, Tom Chapin, Hugh Edwards), stranded on a desert island without adults, soon turn savage.

programme.title: Destroy All Monsters!, (1968, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Scientists (Jun Tazaki, Yoshio Tsuchiya) face Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra and more obscure Japanese monsters sent by she-aliens.

programme.title: Brick Mansions, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: An undercover cop (Paul Walker) joins forces with an ex-con (David Belle) to rescue his kidnapped girlfriend and save Detroit from destruction.

programme.title: Walkabout, (1971, Adventure)
programme.desc: A lost teenager (Jenny Agutter) and her little brother (Lucien John) meet an Aboriginal teen (David Gulpilil) in the Outback.

programme.title: Save Yourselves!, (2020, Comedy)
programme.desc: A young Brooklyn couple head to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: An acclaimed neurologist (Jamie Dornan) taps into the unconscious mind of a 9-year-old boy (Aiden Longworth) who has survived nine near-death accidents.

programme.title: Oracle, (2023, Horror)
programme.desc: A young woman accepts a job on a property with a traumatic past. Upon her arrival, she soon realizes that the nightmares of her childhood are connected to the evil in the house.

programme.title: Candyman 3: Day of the Dead, (1999, Horror)
programme.desc: A woman (Donna D'Errico) tries to disprove a legend that her ancestor (Tony Todd) can appear and kill people with his hook.

programme.title: Need for Speed, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Determined to take down his treacherous rival (Dominic Cooper), a street-car racer (Aaron Paul) runs through a cross-country net of cops and bounty hunters to enter the most prestigious race in the underground racing circuit.

programme.title: Getaway, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: To save his kidnapped wife, a former race-car driver (Ethan Hawke) must follow the instructions of a man (Jon Voight) who is watching his every move through a hidden camera.

programme.title: Taxi Driver, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: A disturbed New York cabby (Robert De Niro) befriends a teenage hooker (Jodie Foster) and frees her from her pimp.

programme.title: High Life, (2018, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Monte and his baby daughter are the last survivors of a damned and dangerous mission to the outer reaches of the solar system. They must now rely on each other to survive as they hurtle toward the oblivion of a black hole.

programme.title: Martha Marcy May Marlene, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: After escaping from a cult, a young woman (Elizabeth Olsen) is haunted by her experiences there and fears that its vicious leader (John Hawkes) may be trying to find her.

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: London publicist Edina Monsoon and best friend Patsy Stone flee to the French Riviera after accidentally knocking supermodel Kate Moss into the River Thames.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Bishop's most formidable foe kidnaps the love of his life in order to make him complete three impossible assassinations and make them look like accidents.

programme.title: For All Mankind, (1989, Documentary)
programme.desc: A unique view of the moon is made possible through film taken by the Apollo astronauts who landed on the surface.

programme.title: Tiny Furniture, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a recent college graduate (Lena Dunham) moves back in with family while she tries to figure out the next step in life.

programme.title: Water for Elephants, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A shared compassion for a special elephant draws together a former veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) and a performer (Reese Witherspoon) in the traveling circus in which they both work.

programme.title: User Zero, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: A passionate neuroscientist must save her patients from her own invention before losing her mind.

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me, (1992, Crime Story)
programme.desc: Agent Cooper (Kyle MacLachlan) comes to Twin Peaks, Wash., following two unresolved murders and the disappearance of two fellow agents.

programme.title: Pens & Pencils, (2022, Thriller)
programme.desc: A high school teacher embarks on a wild-goose chase to find a missing student that no one else seems to miss.

programme.title: Addicted, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman (Sharon Leal) puts her family, career and life on the line to satisfy her addiction to sex.

programme.title: Warcraft, (2016, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A king (Dominic Cooper), a mighty warrior (Travis Fimmel) and a powerful wizard (Ben Foster) unite to defend the human realm of Azeroth from a tyrannical shaman (Daniel Wu) and his invading army of orcs.

programme.title: 3 Days to Kill, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A dying Secret Service agent (Kevin Costner) who wants to reconnect with his estranged daughter (Hailee Steinfeld) is offered a potentially lifesaving drug in exchange for completing one final mission.

programme.title: Shame, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: The arrival of his needy sister (Carey Mulligan) forces a man (Michael Fassbender) to confront his sex addiction out in the open.

programme.title: Free Fire, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: When a black-market arms deal goes outrageously wrong, Justine finds herself caught in the crossfire, forced to navigate through a warehouse full of trigger-happy madmen who are all hanging on for dear life.

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: Spirits of jilted lovers take a photographer (Matthew McConaughey) on an odyssey through his many failed relationships to find out what made him such a cad, and if there is any hope for true love.

programme.title: Almost Christmas, (2016, Christmas)
programme.desc: A beloved patriarch asks his family members for one gift this holiday season: to get along. If they can honor that wish and spend five days under the same roof without killing one another, it will be a Christmas miracle.

programme.title: The Madness of King George, (1994, History)
programme.desc: The 18th-century British monarch (Nigel Hawthorne) loves his devoted queen (Helen Mirren) but illness dramatically affects his mind.

programme.title: The Missouri Breaks, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: An eccentric gunfighter (Marlon Brando) for hire must protect a cattle baron's herd from a rustler (Jack Nicholson) and his gang.

programme.title: Torn Hearts, (2022, Horror)
programme.desc: A country music duo seek out the private mansion of their idol and end up in a twisted series of horrors that force them to confront the limits they'd go for their dreams.

programme.title: Child's Play, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: Two teachers (James Mason, Robert Preston) breed violence at a boys boarding school, with a gym teacher (Beau Bridges) in the middle.

programme.title: Doubt, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Suspicions of child abuse fuel a traditionalist nun's (Meryl Streep) personal crusade against a popular priest (Philip Seymour Hoffman) who wants to reform her school's strict customs.

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Intent on drinking himself to death, a man (Nicolas Cage) who has lost everything finds solace with a Las Vegas hooker (Elisabeth Shue).

programme.title: The Hours, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: The writings of Virginia Woolf (Nicole Kidman) affect a housewife (Julianne Moore) and emulate the life of a New Yorker (Meryl Streep) who is in love with a dying poet.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: After an ambitious manager (Jamie Foxx) gives them a shot at stardom, three singers learn that fame can carry a high personal cost.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Fantasy)
programme.desc: A slain Manhattan yuppie (Patrick Swayze) reaches out to his lover (Demi Moore), with a medium (Whoopi Goldberg) as his middlewoman.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer, (2011, Thriller)
programme.desc: A lawyer (Matthew McConaughey) who operates out of the back of his Lincoln Continental lands the case of a lifetime when he defends a Beverly Hills playboy accused of attempted murder.

programme.title: Challengers, (2024, Drama)
programme.desc: Tensions run high when a grand slam tennis champion finds himself standing across the net from the once-promising, now burnt-out Patrick, his former best friend and his wife's former boyfriend.

programme.title: Godfather of Harlem
programme.desc: An attack on Bumpy's family forces him to team up with unlikely allies to retaliate against Joe Colombo; Margaret stays with Elise and the Panthers and helps Jerome; Pino betrays Stella; Colombo plans a Civil Rights rally in Central Park.

programme.title: Into the Blue 2: The Reef, (2009, Thriller)
programme.desc: Two professional divers (Chris Carmack, Laura Vandervoort) fight for their lives when they encounter criminals in Hawaiian waters.

programme.title: No Way Out, (1987, Thriller)
programme.desc: The secretary of Defense (Gene Hackman) forces a Pentagon naval aide (Kevin Costner) to lead a manhunt for a Soviet spy during a murder cover-up.

programme.title: No Way Out, (1987, Thriller)
programme.desc: The secretary of Defense (Gene Hackman) forces a Pentagon naval aide (Kevin Costner) to lead a manhunt for a Soviet spy during a murder cover-up.

programme.title: Jacob's Ladder, (1990, Horror)
programme.desc: A Vietnam vet prone to flashbacks walks the edge of sanity as he searches for the cause of his nightmarish visions.

programme.title: Boomerang, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: A Manhattan playboy (Eddie Murphy) gets a new corporate boss (Robin Givens), and she treats him the way he has always treated women.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears, (2002, Thriller)

programme.title: Wrath of Man, (2021, Action)

programme.title: A Working Man, (2025, Action)
programme.desc: Levon Cade left behind a military career in the black ops to live a simple life. However, when human traffickers kidnap his boss's daughter, his search to bring her home uncovers a world of corruption far greater than he ever could have imagined.

programme.desc: One man's brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after it's revealed he's a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organization known as Beekeepers.

programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, she'll have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: When Indiana native Everett Case arrives in Raleigh to become the coach at North Carolina State, his vision spearheads not just the rise of college basketball at his school and in the region, but the start of a conference that will change the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: From Frank McGuire to Bones McKinney and Vic Bubas, new coaches emerge to challenge the early success of Everett Case. It all precedes a final poignant moment of triumph for Case at the only home the ACC Tournament has, until this point, ever known.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After a rough start, North Carolina's Dean Smith comes to be known for both dominance and dignity, playing a central role in desegregating the ACC with the recruitment of Charlie Scott, who emerges as a star on some of Smith's greatest teams.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: An intense and high-impact rivalry develops between Maryland and North Carolina State, capped by the finale of the 1974 ACC Tournament in arguably the greatest college basketball game ever - and a battle that helps shape the future of the sport.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Dean Smith's North Carolina teams may be the class of the ACC, but rivals also flourish, including a Virginia team led by Wally Walker, and a Duke program that re-emerges with a championship run in 1978 and a controversial title two years later.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: Virginia's Ralph Sampson earns national player of the year honors three times, but never wins the ACC Tournament. Dean Smith seeks a title with freshman Michael Jordan, and the charismatic Jim Valvano leads NC State on a memorable Cinderella run.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: After previous ACC Tournament heartbreaks, Maryland's Lefty Driesell and Georgia Tech's Bobby Cremins both seek redemption. All the while, Mike Krzyzewski survives early calls for his job and helps turn up the heat on the Duke-Carolina rivalry.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: At Duke, Coach K puts together one of the most iconic teams ever with Christian Laettner, Grant Hill and Bobby Hurley. Wake Forest seeks a return to glory led by Randolph Childress and Tim Duncan, and Dean Smith's career ends in memorable fashion.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball
programme.desc: As a new century dawns, Duke is more dominant than ever, winning seven ACC championships in eight years with a core of stars headlined by Shane Battier and Jay Williams. Roy Williams rejuvenates the Carolina program, while Clemson remains snake bit.

programme.title: The Tournament: A History of ACC Men's Basketball

programme.title: O Grupo Yotsuba contrata Eraldo Bobina para descobrir a identidade de L.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Misa consegue sucesso ao reduzir a um suspeito a identidade de Kira dentro do Grupo Yotsuba: Higuchi.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Higuchi do Grupo Yotsuba, tenta matar Matsuda do corpo especial.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Higuchi capturado e conta aos investigadores tudo sobre o Death Note.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light recuperou suas memrias, em seguida d ordens a Misa que retome os assassinatos.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light removeu todos os obstculos de seu caminho, e est perto de alcanar o seu mundo perfeito.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Aparece um novo investigador, Near, uma figura central na SPK, uma organizao dedicada a pegar Kira sem depender de L.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light atuando como L, revela a Near que sua irm Sayu foi raptada por algum que quer troc-la por um Death Note.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light tenta descobrir onde Mello e da mfia se escondem.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Mello entra na sede da SPK para recuperar uma foto dele e certificar-se de no ser morto por Kira.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Near contata o novo quartel geral da fora especial e determina que Kira est entre os seus integrantes.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: A estrela locutora de notcias Kiyomi Takada se torna a porta-voz mundial de Kira.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light tem como objetivo investigar Kiyomi, enquanto os integrantes do corpo especial escutam pelo auto-falante.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Aizawa percebe o que est acontecendo e alerta Near, o qual j sabia sobre as notas.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Light d a Kiyomi a ordem para matar Near.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: De acordo com o acerto, Near e o SPK se encontram com Light e o corpo especial em um armazm.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Embora Mikami tenha escrito os nomes de todos no Death Note, estavam vivos. Near consegue o Death Note e tudo revelado.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: O brilhante, mas entediado estudante da escola Light Yagami encontra-se mantendo o poder da vida e da morte em suas mos, o Death Note.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Enquanto os criminosos do mundo continuam a morrer, L atende representantes de vrias naes.
programme.desc: Death Note

programme.title: Perdido na Fama, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Turk Henry, um baixista de uma banda mega-platina recentemente separada, leva sua esposa mimada para frias exticas no Chile, mas ela levada por um grupo de piratas que querem dinheiro para comprar um barco.

programme.title: Redeno, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Sam Childers viaja frica para ajudar a reconstruir casas destrudas pela guerra civil. Transformado pelos horrores que presencia, ele decide abrir um orfanato numa regio controlada por milcias.

programme.title: Perdido na Fama, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Turk Henry, um baixista de uma banda mega-platina recentemente separada, leva sua esposa mimada para frias exticas no Chile, mas ela levada por um grupo de piratas que querem dinheiro para comprar um barco.

programme.title: Congelado, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Durante um jantar, Robert sequestrado pela mfia russa e acorda na cmara frigorfica de um restaurante. Ele descobre que o confundiram com outro homem, que deve muito dinheiro aos criminosos.

programme.title: Amor secreto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Maribel e Virginia contam a Irene sobre o beijo de Leonardo e Rebeca; Irene diz a Virginia que ser tia; Leonardo dorme com Rebeca pensando que ela Irene.

programme.title: Amor secreto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Os empregados percebem que Leonardo dormiu com Rebeca; Paula e Irene discutem por Felipe; Mara Luca quer largar a faculdade, mas descobre que seu curso j foi pago; Agustina e Irene discutem.

programme.title: Amor Secreto, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Virginia visita Irene; Julio pergunta a sua av quem filho legtimo de seu pai; o carro de Juan Pablo explode e Carlos garante que foi um ataque; Agustina descobre Rebeca.

programme.title: Um Vero Inesquecvel, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A jovem Kathy passa o vero em um acampamento equestre, quando um torneio interno valendo o ttulo de Princesa do Acampamento surge, Kathy tem que escolher entre vencer ou reconhecer o valor de uma amizade verdadeira.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Camila e Gerardo lamentam a perda de seus parceiros; Maximiliano diz aos amigos que Marfil no tem problemas para ter filhos; Marfil corre para comprar anticoncepcionais sem que Maximiliano saiba.

programme.title: Acorrentada, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Gaviota libertada e Diana se sente sozinha na priso, mas ela se oferece para pagar sua fiana.

programme.title: Confisses de um Filho, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Sean se rebela e sai da casa de sua famlia, para descobrir a vida por conta prpria. Dois anos mais tarde, enquanto ainda tenta encontrar respostas sobre sua vida, Sean confrontado pelo professor, que o desafia a rever sua vida como uma histria.

programme.title: Operao Perigosa, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Aps uma transao de drogas no dar certo, dois traficantes nova-iorquinos se deslocam para Miami, onde estabelecem uma operao de fraude de crdito lucrativa. L, a dupla atrai a ateno dos policiais e criminosos da cidade, que exigem uma parte.

programme.title: Simplesmente Acontece, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Alex e Rosie so amigos inseparveis que cresceram juntos em Londres. Tudo muda quando Alex ganha uma bolsa de estudos e passa a morar nos EUA. Separados, seus caminhos agora so outros. Mas nos tempos de hoje impossvel no se conectar.

programme.title: Relaes de Famlia, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Um homem que se sente enterrado sob uma montanha de dvidas cria uma ligao inesperada com um jovem em uma agncia de cobrana enquanto ambos lutam para se libertar de dvidas, tanto financeiras quanto emocionais.

programme.title: A Recompensa, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps passar 12 anos na priso, o famoso arrombador de cofres Dom Hemingway volta para as ruas de Londres em busca da sua recompensa por ter ficado de boca fechada durante todo esse tempo. Ao lado do amigo Dickie, ele faz uma visita ao chefe do crime.

programme.title: Sem Rastros, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que uma menina desaparece de um parque de trailers, o pai e a me da garota decidem fazer justia com as prprias mos. A busca desesperada dos pais pela verdade acaba levando a uma revelao chocante.

programme.title: O Imperador, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob, que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais.

programme.title: Minsculos - O Filme, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio aos restos de um piquenique, uma joaninha ajuda formigas negras em uma divertida batalha por acar contra formigas vermelhas.

programme.title: Bons pra Cachorro, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Almndega e Cassie, dois ces de estimao, precisam superar suas diferenas para evitar que ladres assaltem a casa dos seus donos.

programme.title: Trs Ladres e um Beb, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: O compulsivo jogador Slipper v o sequestro do neto de um magnata a salvao de suas dvidas. Quando, junto com seu senhorio e o oportunista Octopus, sequestra BB, sem saber, frustram os planos do crime organizado, que tambm est atrs da criana.

programme.title: Uma Histria Americana, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: A violncia do preconceito racial causa um boicote aos transportes por parte da comunidade negra nos anos 1950. Uma aristocrata decide, por convenincia, ajudar sua empregada, mas seu marido a probe. Essa imposio faz com que as duas se unam.

programme.title: Agora a hora do destino! Yugi vs. Atem! Se Yugi derrotar Atem, Yugi prova que est pronto para ficar sozinho, e Atem pode ir ficar com seus amigos no mundo do alm... mas Yugi e Atem se separaro para sempre!

programme.title: Kite - Anjo da Vingana, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Sawa perde o pai policial e a me, vtimas de um macabro duplo homicdio. Com a ajuda do parceirode seu pai, Karl Aker, e uma misteriosa amiga de seu passado Sawa comea uma perseguio implacvel em busca de quem os matou.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva, (2009, Drama)
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Em Busca da Fama, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: Arielle (Bella Thorne) uma jovem de uma cidade pequena da Florida que trabalha em um restaurante, mas sempre quis mais para a sua vida: fama, popularidade, e admirao.

programme.title: Dupla em Fria, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Uma onda de assassinatos sacode Hong Kong. O jovem detetive Wang Bu Er tem certeza de que eles so o trabalho de um assassino em sriee, junto com Huang Fei Hong, um mestre do kung, eles empreendem uma aventura em ritmo acelerado para investigar o caso.

programme.title: Jogo sujo, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Aps assaltar um cassino de Las Vegas, apenas um dos cinco integrantes de uma gangue consegue escapar. O fugitivo decide apagar qualquer memria do seu passado e se torna um xerife. Dez anos depois, os outros quatro ladres rastreiam o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: Codinome Cassius 7, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: A morte de um senador americano faz o ex-agente da CIA Paul abandonar a aposentadoria e se juntar a um jovem oficial do FBI em uma eletrizante operao internacional para desvendar os muitos mistrios por trs do crime.

programme.title: Mercenrio, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Marley trabalha para a mfia cobrando dividas. Quando uma de suas visitas da errado e ele acidentalmente mata uma mulher, o criminoso acaba preso e com um grande sentimento de culpa. Em busca de redeno, Marley decide cuidar da filha da mulher que matou.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.desc: Para proteger a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas necessria para selar a besta de trs caudas, kakashi e naruto enfrentar uma mortal batalha contra guren

programme.desc: It's Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Fiveor so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of purple gas that turns everything living thing in its path into petrified statues of ash!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!

programme.title: Law's got a trick up his sleeve that could mean the difference between life and death. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, but can they reach safety before being swallowed by a poisonous cloud?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Laws Great Escape!

programme.title: Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar and save the children!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance

programme.title: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi's men make the ultimate sacrifice!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tashigi's Tears! G-5's Desperate Breakthrough Plan!

programme.title: Luffy races toward Caesar in the hopes of delivering a beating, Sanji saves a damsel in distress, and Chopper tries to prevent the children from eating the drugged candy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Treacherous Vice Admiral! Demon Bamboo Vergo!

programme.title: Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fierce Battle Gets Heated! Luffy vs. Caesar!

programme.title: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mastermind Underground! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!

programme.title: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar's madness!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!

programme.title: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!

programme.title: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro's Formidable One-Sword Style!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Save Her Friends! Mocha Runs at the Risk of Her Life!

programme.title: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The master of surrealism, Monsieur Dar had spent three years working on his masterpiece, but news is out that the great object of art got stolen.
programme.sub-title: Lupin vs The Man of Two Faces

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Three incidents of bank robbery have happened; a total of 1.3 billion yen was stolen. A man calling himself Goemon is the culprit and he even sends Lupin a challenge, but Goemon wants to settle the score by himself.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of Goemon's Zantetsu Sword

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's stash of Napoleon's cash got stolen, but Lupin catches the culprit and tries to make him confess. Turns out he's only one of the followers of the Fandar cult, and heads to their holy land of Fandara.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin learns that a treasure trove lies in a volcano on Cleo Island, but it can only be reached when the mountain isn't spewing molten lava! He tries to convince Jigen and Goemon to join him but they're not interested.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko informs Lupin that fine quality diamonds from South Africa are stored in a safe of a global syndicate and importer of diamonds. Lupin makes his way as a worker in the boiler room, and steals the loot of diamonds.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds out about the jewel "Poison Trio" of the Borges family and decides to steal it after Fujiko goads him. Galdan, the nephew of Lucricia greets Lupin, and tells him that elderly Lucricia had been arrested and must be broken out of jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin goes on a safe-cracking rampage and rakes in 10 million francs. He needs the money to purchase the world's only rare Gold Butterfly at an auction. But Lupin drops the 10 million francs while on the run

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin scopes a jewelry museum where the billion-dollar gem Cleopatra's Tear is displayed. But Lupin can't get to it because the display case is secured by high-voltage electricity.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: No thief has ever succeeded in stealing the secret gem of Pompeii's nunnery; it's guarded by venomous snakes. Even Arsene Lupin gave up on it, since he hates snakes. But Lupin takes on the challenge. Will Lupin succeed? And what kind of secret gem is it?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though the tycoon Steel had replaced all his bodily organs with artificial organs to live, he's told that he only has a week to live. There is only one way he could prolong his life, which is to receive a brain transplant and he wants Lupin's Brain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Famous gourmand and field mice scientist Salmon Whitney is also known as being the chairman of a Canadian diamond mining operation. Lupin is after his diamonds, which will go on auction in Paris.
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Runs and the Pig Rolls

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Coaxed by Fujiko, Lupin decides to steal the diamond chandelier at the Kremlin Palace. He disguises himself as Zenigata and infiltrates the palace, but government police soldier Natasha captures him and throws him in the slammer.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: England's Lord Weather provokes Lupin with a bet, and dares him to steal Red Arrow away from him. Lupin takes the challenge as it's a matter of pride, but Jigen wants no part of it because he and Weather are gambling buddies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Miami Bank is on the verge of bankruptcy after its last customers closed their accounts. The bank manager Garlic devises a plan to revive the bank, and drums up news that his bank had been raided by Lupin; he also asks Lupin to really do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Thief brothers Nanja-Monja have been in the business since the days of Arsne Lupin; they decide to induct Lupin as a tourist attraction for the Republic of Karchina. But first they abduct Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: Hair Breadth Rescue Operation for Fujiko

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko joins Lupin and gang who are camping and cooking Sukiyaki; people are hunting Fujiko, and gunfire is exchanged. Fujiko gets captured and Lupin's Sukiyaki meal gets ruined, but he finds an atomic bomb's detonator plug inside of the Sukiyaki bowl.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Genius prodigy boy Romanoff has ten doctorates from Russia's Public Academy; blustering that no greater than he exists, he challenges Lupin. Since Fujiko is involved, Lupin cannot back down; what will become of this challenge?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko is the model for Norway's famous sculptor Vingel's crystal mermaid statue; she believed when he said he would give it to her the day it was finished, but Vingel gets greedy and sells it to the mayor of the city of Bergen instead.
programme.sub-title: The Mermaid That Disappears in the Midnight Sun

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin tries to steal a bunch of diamonds from a diamond auction. But the auction auditorium is at the Marine Tower above a skyscraper, and there is only one transparent elevator to get there.
programme.sub-title: The Target is Five Hundred and Fifty Five Meters Away

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin heads to Mecca to steal Mohammed's treasure. But first he is confronted by Patra Lawrence, the grandaughter of the Lawrence of Arabia, who is the chief of Mecca's special police headquarters; how will Lupin steal the treasure now?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Fujiko instigates Lupin and friends to go steal; this time their target is the Jovich Piano installed in a music hall built around it. There is no door large enough in the hall to carry the piano out.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the shipment of raw diamonds that arrived at a harbor in Nice; he sneaks into the storage in the middle of the night but Zenigata was on to him. Lupin escapes with the help of Jigen and Goemon, but Fujiko gets captured.
programme.sub-title: To Arrest Lupin, the Mission at Highway

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A month ago, president Gappolini of one of the world's top five trading companies, had died. Gappolini bequeathed a will saying that the heir to the company presidency will be the world's finest sharpshooter and Jigen is a target.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's said that immense sums of money confiscated from organized crime get transported to a Swiss bank by ICPO, once a year. Naturally, Lupin wants a piece of that action, so he steals the armed security vehicle along with Zenigata in it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The city of Grand Hexagon lies at the border of France and Spain; the city is designed with six sides. But at the center of the city is Raika Bank storing fifty tons of gold bullion; an alarm will go off if even one bullion is missing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Robot soldier Lamda flies above the sky of Tokyo, raids a jewelry store. Its creator, professor Oyamada's daughter Maki and Lupin say that it was just a show to demonstrate the inhumanity of robots.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd: Voyage to Danger
programme.desc: Someone sent orders to assassinate Lupin. Will he survive or die trying!?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: Terminator Genisys, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When John Connor sends Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect a young Sarah Connor, unexpected events alter the past and threaten the future for all mankind. Charged with a new mission, Reese must join forces with Sarah and her "Guardian" to save the world.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate, (2019, Action)
programme.desc: An enhanced super soldier teams up with battle-hardened Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton) and an unexpected ally (Arnold Schwarzenegger) to stop the deadliest Terminator yet. Humanity's fate hangs in the balance in this action-packed thrill ride.

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: The non-human machine ruling elite of the nuclear war-torn future has dispatched a cyborg assassin into the past to kill a young boy because he soon will be the resistance leader against the machines.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: The four rowdy sons of Katie Elder return home for her funeral and to avenge her death.

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Sam Whiskey, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Welcome to America's Wild - and very wacky - West! Burt Reynolds, Clint Walker, Ossie Davis and Angie Dickinson star in this tongue-in-cheek tale of love, lust and larceny as an amiable con-artist is hire by a sexy widow to break into the U.S. Mint.

programme.title: Navajo Joe, (1966, Drama)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds, Aldo Sambrell and Fernando Rey star in this lusty, gutsy action western about a fearless Indian with a relentless vendetta against the band of outlaws that killed his people. Directed by Spaghetti Western legend Sergio Corbucci.

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Barbarosa, (1982, Drama)
programme.desc: A young cowboy hooks up with a legendary outlaw, and before long both are on the run from the law.

programme.title: Hollow Man, (2000, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon and Elisabeth Shue play former lovers who, along with a team of other scientists like themselves, discover the secret of invisibility. Rating: R

programme.title: Eagle Eye, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers trying to escape danger when they are ripped from their ordinary lives and 'activated' as part of a hightech assassination plot.

programme.title: The Gift, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: Widow and mother of three, Annie Wilson makes her living by foretelling others' futures...though her own has become cloudier than even she can see.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Southland Tales, (2006, Thriller)
programme.desc: SOUTHLAND TALES is an ensemble piece set in the futuristic landscape of Los Angeles, as it stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros (Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson) is an action star who's stricken with amnesia.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A small misunderstanding causes Umino and Naru to believe that the other is no longer interested in them.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite has a new target: Makoto. When Haruka and Michiru find out, they decide to use Makoto as bait in order to obtain her talisman.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Kaolinite sets her eyes on Ami, believing that the famous girl genius would possess a pure heart full of confidence.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reis been spending the past several nights chanting to learn the meaning behind the strange nightmares shes been having.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa has returned from the future to complete her training as a Sailor Guardian. She is to learn how to make friends in the twentieth century.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls are taking a tour at one of the high schools they plan to apply to next year.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Michiru and Haruka sense that soon they will find the talismans.

programme.title: Epa! Cad o No?
programme.desc: Dave e seu filho Finny pertencem s espcies raras dos Nestorians, uma espcie que realmente intil. Mas traindo, Finny e Dave conseguem estar a bordo em segredo e com a ajuda involuntria dos carnvoros Hazel e sua filha Leah, que no tm pacincia com esses Nestorians desajeitados.

programme.title: A Maldio da Floresta
programme.desc: Adam e Clare se mudam para uma rea rural com seu filho recm-nascido. Eles logo comeam a receber avisos sobre espritos malignos na regio, mas a jovem famlia prefere apreciar a beleza da floresta.

programme.desc: Em uma comunidade desolada, repleta de viciados, aps uma noite louca, Lou acorda com sintomas de uma doena.

Para escapar ao menos por algum tempo dos problemas, ele consegue emprestado com seu amigo Nick Fisher (Sam Jaeger) um apartamento em Nova York. O Chefe contrata Goodkat (Bruce Willis) para executar o plano, que consiste em encontrar um apostador que deva muito dinheiro ao Chefe a ponto de aceitar matar o filho do Rabino para se livrar da dvida. programme.title: Shaft

programme.desc: Joe um assassino que est na Tailndia para realizar quatro assassinatos sob encomenda. Os alvos so inimigos de Surat, um chefo do crime local. Para no ter que realizar o trabalho sozinho ele contrata Kong, um batedor de carteiras.

programme.desc: Quando um brinquedo antigo doado a um museu localizado no corao de uma floresta, no demora muito para a funcionria Casey Reynolds acreditar que o palhao sinistro de dentro da caixa tem vida prpria.

programme.desc: Cheung Sung-bong um oficial da Unidade Regional de Crime que trabalhou na frente durante muitos anos. O seu protegido, Yau Kong-ngo, respeita-o e consegue chegar at ele. No entanto, o destino coloca-os uns contra os outros.

programme.title: Kite - Anjo da Vingana
programme.desc: Sawa perde o pai policial e a me, vtimas de um macabro duplo homicdio. Com a ajuda do parceirode seu pai, Karl Aker, e uma misteriosa amiga de seu passado Sawa comea uma perseguio implacvel em busca de quem os matou.

programme.desc: Na aldeia da folha, a equipe de konohamaru foi promovida a genin e agora vai a misses nvel d sob a superviso de ebisu. As constante reclamaes de konohamaru lembra iruka e os outros de naruto.at que uma figura passa pelos portes.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Akatsuki Entram Em Ao - S1E2
programme.desc: Jiraiya completou seu novo romance, amassos no paraso, para felicidade de kakashi. Mas jiraiya tambm trouxe notcias altamente secretas de que os akatsuki entraram em ao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Resultados Do Treinamento - S1E3
programme.desc: As habilidades combinadas de naruto e sakura foram kakashi usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto habilmente lana um jutsu aps outro.

programme.title: Naruto: Passado Branco, Ambio Escondida - S1E17
programme.desc: Naruto finalmente explode! Sua raiva por Haku libera o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. O chakra de Naruto est to intenso que at Kakashi e Zabuza, que esto lutando distncia, percebem. Haku incapaz de fazer algo diante do poder secreto de Naruto.

programme.title: Naruto: As Armas Conhecidas Como Shinobi - S1E18
programme.desc: Haku pede a Naruto que acabe com ele. Naruto questiona a filosofia de Haku sobre existir apenas para lutar e ganhar. Enquanto isso, a batalha entre Kakashi e Zabuza chega ao clmax. Com a vitria ao alcance, Kakashi libera sua manobra mais devastadora.

programme.title: Naruto: O Demnio Na Neve - S1E19
programme.desc: Pensando em Haku, Naruto confronta Zabuza com raiva. Sem demonstrar emoes, Zabuza se sente arrasado pela perda de Haku, a nica pessoa em quem confiava no mundo. Naruto aprende que esse tipo de realidade cruel , de fato, o destino de um ninja.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter BR - S1E27
programme.desc: Killua luta contra Zushi e sente que a tcnica estranha dele semelhante usada por Illumi.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter BR - S1E28
programme.desc: O mentor de Zushi, Wing, conta ao Gon e ao Killua sobre a existncia de uma coisa chamada Nen.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter BR - S1E29
programme.desc: Para atravessarem a barreira de Nen de Hisoka, Gon e Killua pedem ao Wing para que os ajude a despertar suas habilidades de Nen.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S1E7
programme.desc: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrvel. Em um ltimo ato de coragem, ele usa as foras que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S1E8
programme.desc: JoJo resgata a irm de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - S1E9
programme.desc: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory - S1E11
programme.desc: Ao viajarem pelo rio Ganges, Ryu e Ken encontram o mstico Dhalsim, que se recusa a ensinar a arte do Ki.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory - S1E12
programme.desc: Depois de serem instrudos por Dhalsim a se dirigir ao templo proibido, Ryu e Ken encontram duas esttuas aparentemente indestrutveis.

programme.title: Street Fighter II - Victory - S1E13
programme.desc: Dhalsim aceita ensinar a Ryu e Ken uma energia mstica chamada Hadou, mas Ryu no consegue controlar a energia e precisa entrar no templo mais uma vez.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E121
programme.desc: Boruto consegue encontrar Sasuke, mas v seu mestre desaparecer aps um ataque de Urashiki Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E122
programme.desc: Liderados por Kankuro, Boruto e Shinki protegem Shukaku e seguem para a Aldeia da Folha, mas so interceptador por marionetes criadas e enviadas pelo Cl Otsutsuki.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Jinchuriki Da Areia - S1E4
programme.desc: Gaara rapidamente descobrir a presena da deidara, e uma batalha area com deidara em seu pssaro gigante e gaara acontece na areia. O jonin da areia yura que, na verdade, um agente da akatsuki, e a aldeia da areia sofre grandes danos.

programme.title: O quinto combate entre Tenten e Temari. Tenten, mestre em armas areas e vrias outras, que so repelidas pelo leque de Temari. O sexto combate entre Shikamaru e Kin. Kin parece estar em vantagem, mas Shikamaru usa seu Jutsu Possesso da Sombra.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Kunoichi Assassina E Um Trmulo Shikamaru - S1E43

programme.title: No stimo combate, Naruto enfrenta Kiba, que traz seu cachorro Akamaru. Kiba usa o Jutsu Quatro Patas para atacar Naruto, que consegue virar a mesa. Entretanto, Akamaru e Kiba consomem Plulas de Comida e comeam um ataque intenso contra Naruto.
programme.desc: Naruto: Akamaru Se Revela, Quem O Melhor Cachorro? - S1E44

programme.title: Depois de consumir Plulas de Comida, os nveis de chakra de Kiba e Akamaru aumentam, e ambos comeam a contra-atacar Naruto. Naruto usa Jutsu de Transformao contra Kiba e tenta ganhar com uma nova manobra secreta. O que ser que Naruto planejou?!
programme.desc: Naruto: Ataque Surpresa, A Arma Secreta do Naruto - S1E45

programme.title: No oitavo combate, os primos Hinata e Neji do cl Hyuga se enfrentam. Embora a tmida Hinata no seja preo para a agressividade de Neji, ela consegue ganhar fora ao escutar as palavras de Naruto. Como ser que esta batalha terminar?
programme.desc: Naruto: Batalha Byakugan: Hinata Ganha Coragem! - S1E46

programme.title: Hinata enfrenta Neji, mas ele ataca o ponto de presso dela com Byakugan (olhos brancos). O fluxo de chakra de Hinata para, e ela quase perde a conscincia. Ela encontra coragem ao lembrar como Naruto no desiste de nenhuma dificuldade.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Derrota Digna - S1E47

programme.title: No nono combate, Gaara finalmente aparece e seu oponente Lee, um especialista em taijutsu (tcnica fsica). Lee usa esta poderosa tcnica contra Gaara, que manipula areia de sua cabaa. Ento, a Armadura de Areia de Gaara finalmente se solta...
programme.desc: Naruto: Gaara Conta Rock Lee, O Poder Da Juventude Explode - S1E48

programme.title: Lee usa a tcnica banida, Ltus Primria, para atacar Gaara. A luta parece ter terminado, mas a manobra apenas danifica a proteo feita pela areia de Gaara. Imvel aps de ter usado Ltus Primria, Lee lanado facilmente por toda parte por Gaara.
programme.desc: Naruto: A Fora Oculta De Lee: Um Jutsu Secreto Proibido - S1E49

programme.title: Lee decide usar a manobra proibida, Ltus Oculta, que libera trs ou mais dos oito portais que possuem a concentrao dos pontos de chakra. Quando os oito portais se abrem, o usurio pode morrer. Mas Gaara responde com seu prprio ataque, Atade de Areia.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Quinto Porto, Um Ninja Esplndido - S1E50

programme.title: No ltimo combate das preliminares, Choji luta contra o capanga de Orochimaru, Dosu. As preliminares finalmente terminam, e o Hokage revela a terceira prova, enquanto Orochimaru comea secretamente seu plano maligno.
programme.desc: Naruto: Uma Sombra Na Escurido: O Perigo Se Aproxima De Sasuke - S1E51

programme.title: Na preparao para a terceira prova, Kakashi escolhe Ebisu para treinar Naruto. Ebisu diz a Naruto que ele ainda no controla seu chakra o suficiente e o faz caminhar sobre gua. Naruto aprende rpido e impressiona Ebisu. Ento, uma figura aparece...
programme.desc: Naruto: Ebisu Volta: O Treinamento Mais Duro De Naruto - S1E52

programme.title: Jiraiya, um dos Sannin lendrios, aparece de repente diante de Ebisu e Naruto. Naruto d a Jiraiya o apelido de "Sbio Tarado".
programme.desc: Naruto: Aps Muito Tempo...Jiraiya Retorna! - S1E53

programme.title: O ninja do Som, Dosu, aparece diante de Gaara e pretende derrot-lo, mas o oposto acontece. Um jonin da Aldeia da Areia e Kabuto os observam secretamente.
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu De Invocao : A Sabedoria Do Sbio Do Sapo! - S1E54

programme.title: Naruto continua seu treino com Jiraiya para dominar o Jutsu de Invocao, que chama vrias criaturas selvagens. Mas ele tem dificuldades em controlar o Chacra da Raposa de Nove Caudas.
programme.desc: Naruto: Um Sentimento De Anseio, Uma Flor Cheia De Esperana - S1E55

programme.title: J se passaram trs semanas que Naruto treina com Jiraiya. E Naruto esteve a ponto de cair vrias vezes.
programme.desc: Naruto: Viva Ou Morra : Arrisque Tudo Para Ganhar Tudo - S1E56

programme.title: Naruto finalmente realiza o Chacra de Nove Caudas e utiliza o Jutsu de Invocao. Gamabunta aparece e no acredita que Naruto o invocou.
programme.desc: Naruto: Ele Voa!Ele Salta!Ele Espreita!O Chefe Sapo Aparece! - S1E57

programme.title: No dia da prova, Gaara desaparece do lugar que o ninja da Areia estava ficando e vai para o hospital da Aldeia da Folha.
programme.desc: Naruto: Hospital Sitiado : A Mo Do Mal Revelada! - S1E58

programme.title: O dia da prova chega finalmente. O primeiro oponente de Naruto Neji Hyuga.
programme.desc: Naruto: As Rodadas Finais : A Corrida Para Arena De Batalha - S1E59

programme.title: Finalmente, a Prova Chunin comea com oito ninjas que foram qualificados nas preliminares. Mas ningum sabe onde Sasuke est.
programme.desc: Naruto: Byakugan Contra O Jutsu Clones Das Sombras! - S1E60

programme.title: Naruto no consegue usar o Jutsu Clones das Sombras contra Neji que consegue ver seu pontos de chacra!
programme.desc: Naruto: A Derradeira Defesa : No Ponto Zero! - S1E61

programme.title: A batalha entre Naruto e Neji continua, e Neji demonstra seu enorme poder.
programme.desc: Naruto: O Verdadeiro Poder Do Fracassado! - S1E62

programme.title: Derrotado por Naruto, Neji levado para o hospital, quando o tio de Neji, Hiashi, aparece.
programme.desc: Naruto: Bata Ou Desista ! As Rodadas Finais Ficam Complicadas! - S1E63

programme.title: A luta de Sasuke adiada. a vez de Shikamaru, mas ele no tem vontade de lutar por pensar que a luta dele seja apenas um combate secundrio
programme.desc: Naruto: Motivao Zero : O Cara Com Inveja Da Nuvem - S1E64

programme.title: Na luta entre Shikamaru e Temari, Shikamaru que tem a vantagem faz uma deciso surpreendente.
programme.desc: Naruto: Folha Danante, Areia Contorcida - S1E65

programme.title: A luta antecipada de Sasuke e Gaara comea. Gaara sinistramente fala com si mesmo, como se estivesse falando com outra pessoa.
programme.desc: Naruto: Jutsu Do Sobrancelhudo ... Stilo Sasuke! - S1E66

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia - S2E70
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - S2E71
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima - S2E72
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki - S2E73
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado - S2E74
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge - S2E75
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo - S2E76
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata - S2E77
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento - S2E78
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido - S2E79
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras - S2E80
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes - S2E81
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez - S2E82
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira! - S2E83
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu - S2E84
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo - S2E85
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru - S2E86
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo! - S2E87
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Estilo Vento: Rasen Shuriken! - S2E88
programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder - S2E89
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi - S2E90
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto! - S2E91
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro - S2E92
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E159
programme.desc: Boruto e sua equipe finalmente encontram o pesquisador desaparecido. Apesar de ele resistir, a equipe est determinada a lev-lo de volta em segurana ao cliente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E160
programme.desc: Deixando Mitsuki sob os cuidados de Yubina, uma mdica e amiga de Mugino, Boruto e os outros vo a um mercado clandestino no Pas do Silncio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E161
programme.desc: Boruto e os outros descobrem que a Clula do Hashirama est nas mos de um indivduo rico que vive no Castelo Fushuu e planejam recuper-la.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E162
programme.desc: Boruto e os outros se envolvem em um incidente no Castelo Fushuu, e alm de serem taxados de criminosos, eles so perseguidos por uma gangue do Pas do Silncio.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E163
programme.desc: A Equipe 7 e Mugino conseguem despistar a gangue e continuam a perseguir os culpados.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E164
programme.desc: Boruto e sua equipe finalmente alcanam os verdadeiros ladres.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E165
programme.desc: Boruto e os outros conseguem escapar da barreira de Yuuga, mas agora, seu irmo mais novo, Hiruga, entra no caminho.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E166
programme.desc: Boruto e sua equipe esto determinados a alcanar Asaka, o irmo mais velho dos ninjas do Pas do Silncio, antes de Deepa.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E167
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada se recuperam no Hospital da Folha enquanto Mitsuki retorna a Orochimaru para tratamento.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E168
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada comeam um treinamento intensivo aps experimentarem a derrota.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E169
programme.desc: A equipe 10 de Shikadai, Inojin e Chocho recebe uma misso conjunta com Shinki, Yodo e Araya da Aldeia da Areia para encontrar e recuperar um Boneco Otsutsuki que Shikadai enfrentou uma vez.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E170
programme.desc: Shikadai, que j sentiu o poder aterrorizante de Deepa, diz a Boruto que uma revanche com Deepa seria imprudente.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E171
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de Kakashi, Boruto consegue desenvolver o seu prprio estilo de Rasengan. Sasuke e Sakura trocam de lugar para treinar a filha.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E172
programme.desc: Iwabe, Denki e Metal visitam Boruto no hospital aps ele ter treinado demais.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E173
programme.desc: Konohamaru e Mugino recebem informaes de que o Senhor Feudal do Pas dos Vales far uma visita companhia, dando a eles a oportunidade de conferir o interior dessa instalao secreta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E174
programme.desc: Boruto e Sarada correm para o laboratrio de pesquisa de Victor, onde encontram uma planta horripilante roubando o chakra das pessoas prximas a ela.

programme.desc: Separado de Boruto e Sarada, Konohamaru enfrenta Victor. Mas uma pessoa inesperada aparece para lutar ao lado dele.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E176
programme.desc: Konohamaru e seus colegas de equipe relatam a descoberta de que a Kara recebe a assistncia de membros externos, e que essas pessoas se infiltraram secretamente nas Cinco Grandes Naes Shinobi.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E177
programme.desc: O Cl Yamanaka, que tem rastreado o trfego de entrada e sada da aldeia com suas habilidades sensoriais avanadas, lidera um plano para criar um sistema sensorial novo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E178
programme.desc: Um servio funerrio est sendo realizado em memria dos muitos que morreram na Quarta Grande Guerra Ninja.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations - S1E179
